bibl.title: Territory of Washington V. E. Romick. Subpoena for M. J. Malony
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Lincoln}ss.

To M.J. Malony In the name of the United States, You are hereby required to appear before the undersigned, one of the Justices of the Peace and for said County, on the 27th day of February 1885, at 4 o'clock P.M. at his office in Sprague W.T. to give evidence in a certain cause then and there to be tried between The Territory of Washington Plaintiff and E Romick Defendant, on the part of the Territory
Given under my hand this 27th day of February 1885 E. G. Pendleton Justice of the Peace

Territory of Washington County of Lincoln}ss I hereby certify that I served the within subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to him at Sprague Lincoln Co. W.T. this 27th day of Feb 1885

Territory of Washington vs. E Romick
SUBPOENA.
Filed Feby 28 1885 E. G. Pendleton Justice of the Peace.
